results.content: Very good and detailed course on Linq.
results.content_html: Very good and detailed course on Linq.

results.content:
Il docente è sicuramente competente ed il corso valido ma, l'inglese non è corretto e il traduttore dei sottotitoli non riesce a fare il suo lavoro.
Corso utile, peccato per l'inglese.

results.content: A pesar de estar en otro idioma al español se entiende muy bien

results.content: This course covers in depth LINQ. Just I think that could be better if LINQ was explained together with Lambda expressions. I think was lack some exercises to consolidate the learning too.
results.content_html: This course covers in depth LINQ. Just I think that could be better if LINQ was explained together with Lambda expressions. I think was lack some exercises to consolidate the learning too.

results.content: Course is Superb. I have learned a lot of new things
results.content_html: Course is Superb. I have learned a lot of new things

results.content: Mr. Sandeep is an amazing teacher. He explains the concepts with great detail and his explanation are exceptionally easy to understand. Clearly, he has been doing this for a long time. I have gone on to also buy his additional courses and his personal site's membership. Definitely recommend trying the course.
